alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 21 at 9:44PM EST until November 22 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed wintry precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Clinton and Eastern Essex Counties. * WHEN...Through 1 PM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on icy road conditions overnight and through Wednesday morning from a combination of snow, sleet, and freezing rain. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...As of 9PM...ice accumulation of 0.07 inches has been reported at the Plattsburgh International Airport. The mixed precipitation will gradually change to plain rain during the mid to late morning hours on Wednesday. However, localized pockets of icy conditions on roads and sidewalks can be expected, especially in areas of hilly terrain.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
